input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: My decision has a direct effect on penguin mood and foot size. Penguin mood has a direct effect on foot size. The overall probability of taking the elevator is 36%. The probability of taking the stairs and large feet is 29%. The probability of taking the elevator and large feet is 17%. Is the chance of large feet larger when observing taking the elevator?
